summary.headline: All the data you need, in one place
summary.subHead: Lighthouse is a robust engine for revenue generation, profiling and optimization purposes

columns.headline: Data: The new oil
columns.content: Data can unlock ways of helping Nigeria plan for and respond to some of the biggest challenges facing the nation in areas such as health, social, security and indigenous affairs

A database engine for revenue generation, profiling & optimization purposes. It highlights anomalies in revenue forecast, performance & provides relevant information about revenue generating entities.
columns.headline: Profiling Engine
Decision making
columns.content: An Artificial Intelligence engine that provides the FMF and Revenue stakeholders (including Tax authorities) with empirical data to make informed decisions.

callout.headline: Command Centre/Service Provision Unit
callout.content: With this initiative, the Federal Ministry of Finance (FMF) provides rapid response to stakeholders thereby dramatically improving revenue collection.

extraSummary.headline: Project Lighthouse is a data-driven Artificial Intelligence engine
extraSummary.content: It provides the Federal Ministry of Finance (FMF) with an intelligence and profiling platform to support its departments and agencies to develop a more efficient revenue assessment methodology by ensuring that major revenue loopholes are plugged, and revenue collection is dramatically improved.

verify.headline: Verify your debt status with ease
verify.summary: Are you a registered company, contractor, consultant or service provider with the Corporate Affairs Commission(CAC)? Verify your debt status in no time.
